website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost mower for those who want a simple machine with few bells and whistles.
pros: Can discharge from side or rear as well as mulch
cons: Although it hails from a reputable maker, there have been some quality control issues reported

customer_reviews.title: Good little mower, only three stars because of my issues
customer_reviews.text: Great little mower for price. Starts effortlessly and does the job. Only complaints where when delivered, the box it came in looked as if it was dropped from the sky. The oil that comes with it ruptured in the box and coated the entire mower. After cleanup i began assembly and found the rear height adjusting lever was bent and twisted so bad it wouldn't work properly I had to disassemble the whole rear axle to straighten out the lever. Thankful it didn't snap when straightening it. A lot of people would have probably just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: John weber

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I had same issue with the tbolt does not align right. Went to lowes and bought a torrque wrench to tighten it. It just slips out . Also when at lowes i could have gotten a self propeld mower. For almost the same price and it also was a craftsman. Would not buy this product or any major product online again. Its easier to go to the store find what you want and leave and its easy to return a product then sending it off.
customer_reviews.author: Arron Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Needs a bit of elbow grease
customer_reviews.text: Starts right up easy to use my 10 yr old daughter starts it no problem. However there is a flaw the deck adjuster on rear wheels was bent pretty bad I seen someone else had the same issue the back wheels are on a shaft that just pops off and you can just take a pair of pliers and bend it bad not a big deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J.d klotz

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: it came with parts falling off could not put them back on. The box was a mess all broken up. Sent it back . Went with a Honda at a Honda store. They put it together for me and showed me how it works. Put gas and oil in it ,put it in a van and came home with me, and started it up to make sure it was in working order.
customer_reviews.author: the wall

customer_reviews.title: Several Problems with this Lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lawnmower for its bagging capability. Problems with this lawnmower include the following: (1) Bagging Attachment - does not fit snug around rear grass feeder. 1/4 of all grass clippings will shoot out of small spaces instead of into the bag. (2) Packaging - the boxed lawnmower will have oil everywhere. I mean everywhere. Very hard to clean up. (3) Parts - impossible finding parts for this particular model using the model number or the serial number of this lawnmower.
customer_reviews.author: KLF

customer_reviews.title: Returned This Product
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because when UPS delivered it, it looked like it had been dropped from an airplane onto my front lawn. The shipping box was completely destroyed, and who knows what happened to the mower inside.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Scott

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t start. I checked the coil, plug and carburetor. No fire. The quality of this thing is subpar and I will never purchase another Craftsman product
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Mower, Lighter than Most
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I docked a star was for the assembly process. The parts don't stay in place very well when trying to attach them and some of the metal is a little warped, making fitting screws difficult. After a frustrating assembly though it has worked like a dream. Barely needs any gas to run and cuts through thick grass like a dream. I had an overgrown yard (3 weeks worth) since my last mower died and this little powerhouse cut through it all no problem without needing a refill!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I live this! Was worried buying something like this online. I am not disappointed at all! I’m a woman and this is the first law mower I can start on my own. The box was opened when it arrived, but I think that’s the UPS for ya...
customer_reviews.author: Brandylee S.

customer_reviews.title: Beware about buying - waste of moneym
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mower, except for the grass bag. Poorly engineered. The metal support is designed backwards, the grass will never fill the bag before having to emptying it. It drags on the ground. Grass is always caught at the joint. A new bag will need to be purchased relatively soon. The way I look at purchases if any part is poorly engineered or faulty. It’s a wast of money. Will give mine away to purchase a different brand. Craftsman is no longer the best brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: As my first mower (I’ve lived in houses with small yards my whole life and only ever needed a push reel mower until now). This is perfect for our needs, and starts up with no issues. It stores away easily and compactly. Glad I chose the warehouse deal on this one- I actually look forward to yard work now.
customer_reviews.author: teemee234

customer_reviews.title: Will not start anymore, I have had it less than a year
customer_reviews.text: The mower will not start anymore, I have tried everything in the user manual - changed gas, new spark plug but still will not start, support info does not cover this model - Seller please contact me ASAP my Grass is getting TALL!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Archer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It looks like an excellent machine for the money. Assembled it, and it cranked the first time. It cuts grass well, and so far, it works great. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Foxcritter

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy starts, simple machine
customer_reviews.text: It works great for me, it started easily every time. It was easy to assemble, and the instructions were in real english
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: I suppose it wouldn't be that hard to assemble if all the parts were included.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Dallam

customer_reviews.title: oil leak
customer_reviews.text: Why is the oil leaking straight out of the mower, I am so pissed off. only just put it together and it is pass the return date
customer_reviews.author: L Leary

customer_reviews.title: do not buy lawnmower from anazon
customer_reviews.text: does not work costs too much to send back looks like i am screwed
customer_reviews.author: phyllis flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mower for a very small backyard. It replaced a self propelled and does a great job. It is exactly what I was looking for, in price and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Craftsman lawnmower. It does everything that it is supposed to. Very easy to walk behind.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: Got this and we love it. Very easy to assemble. Works great. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mower, easy to use, Very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Lawnmower arrive quickly and super easy to put together. Only had to attached handle. Came with oil . Started with one pull. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Diane Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Mower
customer_reviews.text: Great Mower. Proud to own such a fine piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good mower
customer_reviews.text: The grass doesn’t go in the bag too well. Maybe 50-80%. Maybe I was trying to cut too low. Works better when the height of the mower is higher. But it starts on first pull and the lawn looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Easy start
customer_reviews.text: Big rear wheels make it easy to Maneuver Around . Easy height adjustment Easy start
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wahlert

customer_reviews.title: THis lawnmower is exactly what I wanted. Easy to use. No bells and wistles.
customer_reviews.text: This product is good. I would recommend if you don't want anything fancy
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Eberhahn

customer_reviews.title: Great as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great as expected, the left front wheel was slightly twisted but it didn’t take much to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Giancarlo Spadaro

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive machine.
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought such a cheap mower and here a year later it has not been at all disappointing. The mower always starts on the second or third pull and has completed every mowing job I have asked of it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D Mattoon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Starts and runs quite well!. Very light weight. Outstanding cutting quality! Made in the USA! Would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked this lawn mower because it is lightweight and very easy to start. I have Owen two outer Craftsman lawnmower in my lifetime and they have been great products. The value of the lawnmower plus free shipping. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Puentes

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my moms house, they said it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package opened.
customer_reviews.text: Right rear wheel adjustment level bent, unable to use all heights. This also caused it hard to attach handle screw, off center.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Harshbarger

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This went together very easy, and cut my yard just like i needed . Well impressed with it
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Easy to start adjust and service.
customer_reviews.author: charles churchill

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Handles flex, engine locked up in the middle of mowing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Started first pull of the cord
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great right out of the box. Very good product that started on the very first pull of the cord.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Parts fell off
customer_reviews.text: It runs well. However, 2 of the wheel adjustment tabs fell off. I now have to find replacements.Can you tell me where?
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bolster

customer_reviews.title: decent value starts every time
customer_reviews.text: i did have the pull handle break but I fixed it
customer_reviews.author: Victor Capatch

customer_reviews.title: It comes with oil to start you out
customer_reviews.text: It works very nice and does a nice job cutting the lawn
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Starts with one pull!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to push , starts with one pull!
customer_reviews.author: H. Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Broken lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: Mower came broken. It’s hard to rate as it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: works well no problems wanted something to go were rider cant go
customer_reviews.author: Kim Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Not all the pieces were in the box and had to buy parts that were supposed to be included.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great mower.
customer_reviews.text: Great all around mower. Better than I expected, and we'll worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: robert p. camerzell

product_meta.title: Craftsman M115 11A-B25W791 Push Lawn Mower, durable 7" Front & 8" Rear wheels, Red
product_meta.description: Style:M115: 140cc 21-Inch PushPerfect your lawn with Craftsman 140cc Briggs & Stratton 550E 21" 3-In-1 push lawn mower with bagger. Powered by a 140cc engine with a recoil start & auto choke, this push lawn mower is equipped with both side & rear discharge & mulching capabilities. It comes with a 21" Cutting deck that allows you to mow wider areas of grass with fewer passes- perfect for small- or medium-sized yd. It is equipped with a dual lever that allows you to adjust the trimmings between 6 different heights. The durable 7" Front & 8" Rear wheels are made with bar treading to allow you to drive effortlessly through hard & loose soil. Backed by 2 year.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Craftsman M115 140cc 21-Inch Push Lawn Mower | One bagger & engine oil

Lawn Mower cut width – 21” | Weight – 72.8 lbs. | Minimum Cutting Height – 1.25” | Maximum Cutting Height – 3.75” | Front wheel size – 7” | Rear wheel size – 11” | Engine – 140cc Briggs and Stratton | Engine torque (Ft/Lbs.) – 5.5
Choose from 6 different height settings to suit user’s needs
Unit has side discharge, rear discharge, and mulching capabilities
Efficient cutting deck helps trim grass in one quick pass for an easier yard job

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars128 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
